message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000, a price that allows for a substantial return on your investment. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you decide not to proceed, I have another buyer lined up. Please let me know your decision.
